ÇOK GÜZEL OYUN ESKİDEN BERİ OYNUYORUM VE HALA OYNAMAYA DEVAM EDİYORUM HER KEZE TAVSİYE EDERİM. <3

This game is dead just because the anticheat. I ve played this day 2 comps and 3 wings and I ve seen like 6 spin bots ( I have premium enabled, buyed not from leveling up). For new players this game is a pice of trash, you literally cannot do anything if you are noob and if u know a lil bit how to play this game you are going crazy cause of the cheaters u face and the fact that they are not getting banned. The majority of the cheaters are premades (u cannot kick them out fromm ur team) and you are getting banned for killing those trashes of people. The games sees u killing a spinboting guy in ur team but the game does not see the 100%hs of the player and the fact that he is staring trough the walls and facing the grown while shooting and hitting perfect bhops. I regret the 15 euro paid for this trash. Dont ever play cs if u didnt before, I assure u that is better to play anything else but not this.

В последнее время стало очень много читеров! невозможно играть! Они даже не скрывают что используют читы. Репорты похоже никто не обрабатывает, читеры процветают.
Со временем надоедает но ждем лучших обновлений
